definition: to stay/to stop/to tease (play with)/amusing/short pause in reading aloud, equivalent to comma (also written 讀|读[dou4])
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve

sentences.english: The additional night's stay can help increase ancillary spending.
sentences.chinese: 加夜逗留能夠幫助增加輔助消費。

sentences.english: Thaksin and his wife, Pojaman, were in Beijing until Sunday for the opening of the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 他信夫婦在北京參加奧運開幕式，一直逗留到星期天。

sentences.english: He became acquainted with many well-known writers during her short stay there.
sentences.chinese: 她在那短暫逗留期間結識了許多名作家。

sentences.english: Remaining in the deep water for a while, she begins to kick her way up towards the surface.
sentences.chinese: 她在深水中逗留片刻之後開始踢打着水向水面游去。

sentences.english: Did you go bathing in the sea while you were there?
sentences.chinese: 你在那裏逗留期間，到大海里進行海水浴沒有？

sentences.english: Class of Random Walks on Half-line in Random Environments.
sentences.chinese: 一類隨機環境中半直線上的可逗留隨機遊動。

sentences.english: Their guest did not protract his stay that evening above an hour longer.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上他們的客人逗留不到一個鐘頭。

sentences.english: After about two hours, we went back to the Old City.
sentences.chinese: 在拉市海逗留了大概2個小時，又坐車返回麗江古城。

sentences.english: He decide to cut remaining time after he receive his family's letter.
sentences.chinese: 他接到家信後決定縮短在這裏的逗留時間。

sentences.english: And this is their custom with all merchants as long as they tarry in the city.
sentences.chinese: 而只要商人們在城中逗留，這便是他們的習俗。

sentences.english: Wie lange m?chten Sie hier bleiben, Herr Thomas?
sentences.chinese: 托馬斯先生，請問您準備在此逗留多久？

sentences.english: They stopped over in Beijing for several days.
sentences.chinese: 他們中途在北京逗留了幾天。

sentences.english: The last two days of her stay there it rained like fury.
sentences.chinese: 她在那兒逗留的最後兩天裏大雨滂沱。

sentences.english: As of Monday, there were about 250 illegals remaining.
sentences.chinese: 截止到週一爲止，仍有250名非法移民逗留。

sentences.english: They visited some ancient chateaux while they stayed in France.
sentences.chinese: 在法國逗留期間他們參觀了一些古堡。

definition: to stay somewhere temporarily/to stop over
to stay for a long time
to stay/to remain/to linger/(computing) to reside/resident (program etc)
to return/to go back/to come back
to wander/to roam about/to loaf about/to be idle
to go sightseeing/to spend one's leisure time wandering around
to pace/to linger/to stay over/to spiral/to hover
to hasten on with one's journey/to hurry on
to go on a journey/to leave
to roll/to wander around/to appear repeatedly
to conceal oneself/to go into hiding/to take cover
to tail behind/to tag along/to follow on the heels of
